forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow likely. High 2C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 80%. 3-7cm of snow expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Snow likely. High 36F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of snow 80%. Snow accumulating 1 to 3 inches.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Snow showers. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low -1C. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than 2cm.
forecastday.fcttext: Occasional snow showers. Areas of freezing rain possible. Low 31F. Winds light and variable. Chance of snow 50%. Snow accumulations less than one inch.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain in the afternoon. High 2C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of precip 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: A mix of rain and freezing rain in the morning. Rain in the afternoon. Temps nearly steady in the mid 30s. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of precip 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 1C. Winds E at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. 25 to 50mm of rain expected.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 33F. Winds E at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%. 1 to 2 inches of rain expected.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 8C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain. High 46F. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. Low 37F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High around 5C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain. High 41F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low 1C. Winds W at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of snow 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Mostly cloudy skies with late-night snow showers. Low 34F. Winds W at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of snow 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and snow in the morning. The rain and snow will change to rain showers in the afternoon. High around 5C. Winds NW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain and snow in the morning changing to rain showers late. High 41F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 50%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear to partly cloudy. Low -2C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds. Low 29F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Low around 0C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness. Low 32F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low near 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 43F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Generally fair. Low around 0C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly clear skies. Low 32F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Intervals of clouds and sunshine in the morning with more clouds for later in the day. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Some sun in the morning with increasing clouds during the afternoon. High 43F. Winds E at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 30%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with a few showers. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 30%.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain showers. High 6C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 43F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with showers. Low 3C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Overcast with rain showers at times. Low 37F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.
